Text:
The idiots are always cancelling shows, it's unfortunate!  We get one or two seasons of great shows then they get cancelled for some sort of stupid reality show.  I was hoping Dollhouse would at least continue for awhile :(

Thanks Eztv!  Your efforts are appreciated!
Thanks for another post eztv! Awesome episode!

Well, I'm looking forward to the final episode. What an ending to this one!

Thanks!
